Detailed Description

Patient class

Store data related to an actual patient in the survey, who may log in by him/herself as a user, or may be logged in by a research/clinic user

Copyright 2013 University of Washington, School of Nursing. http://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause

$  centralSupport,
$  researchStaff,
$  fieldName,
$  startdate = null,
$  enddate = null,
$  exclude 
)

Return all eligible, consented participants that a particular staff member can see that have $fieldName within a date range

Parameters:
$staff_id id of the staff member
$centralSupport True if they are CentralSupport
$researchStaff True if they are research staff
$fieldName eg "Patient.birthdate", or "PatientExtension.primary_randomization_date"
$startdate Start of the datetime range (optional, if not included no lower limit applied)
$enddate End of the datetime range (optional, if not included no end date limit applied)
$exclude Array of patient id's to exclude
Returns:
all patients the staff member can see whose randomization date is in the datetime range, in an array

const Patient::TREATMENT = 'Treatment'

Value for study_group field that indicates patient is in the treatment group

const Patient::CONTROL = 'Control'

Value for study_group field that indicates patient is in the control group

const Patient::USUAL_CARE = 'usual care'

Default / initial consent_status indicates patient has not yet qualified for pre-consent

const Patient::OFF_PROJECT = 'off-project'

consent_status indicates patient will not be put thru consent process

const Patient::PRECONSENT = 'pre-consent'

consent_status indicating that the patient has a FINS score at or above threshold, but has not yet consented or declined to join the study

const Patient::ELEMENTS_OF_CONSENT = 'elements of consent'

Value for consent_status field that indicates patient has indicated willingness to consent to join the study, but paperwork not done yet

const Patient::CONSENTED = 'consented'

Value for consent_status field that indicates patient has consented to join the study

const Patient::DECLINED = 'declined'

Value for consent_status field that indicates patient has declined to join the study

const Patient::HOME = 'Home/Independent'

Value for the user_type field

const Patient::CLINIC = 'Clinic/Assisted'

Value for the user_type field

const Patient::MEDONC = 'MedOnc'

Value for clinical_service field

const Patient::RADONC = 'RadOnc'

Value for clinical_service field

const Patient::TRANSPLANT = 'Transplant'

Value for clinical_service field

const Patient::SURGERY = 'Surgery'

Value for clinical_service field

const Patient::PATIENT = 'Patient'

Value for patientType parameter indicating we only want non-participants

const Patient::PARTICIPANT = 'Participant'

Value for patientType parameter indicating we only want participants

const Patient::ON_STUDY = 'On study'

Value for the off_study_status field

const Patient::COMPLETED = 'Completed all study requirements'

Value for the off_study_status field

const Patient::OSINELIGIBLE = 'Ineligible'

Value for the off_study_status field
